column3: the flavors were to die for... The yellowtail balanced perfectly with the ponzu
column4: thai chili and orange segments. It was in my opinion the best dish of the night. The Karaage (chicken thigh
column5: Sweet chili and seasonal pickle) was just ok
column6: there wasn't anything that really stood out flavor wise from that dish. The shishito peppers were grilled perfectly and was served with a great dipping sauce.
